ai.summary: Fladdabister Old Road is an easy 5.7 km hike in the UK along a historic road. The route is suitable for most walkers, offering a gentle, mostly flat surface with rural scenery and minimal ascent.
ai.terrain_summary: Predominantly a well-trodden road or compact track with flat to gently undulating terrain. Expect grassy verges and occasional muddy patches after rain; exposed sections may catch wind.
ai.safety_notes: Check the day’s weather and daylight hours. Wear sturdy footwear and bring waterproof clothing. Stay on the route, be mindful of any traffic on rural lanes, and carry water and a fully charged phone. If coastal or exposed areas are involved, beware of wind and waves; note tides if applicable.
ai.best_seasons: Spring to autumn. Mild temperatures and longer daylight make for the most comfortable hiking conditions; conditions can be windy and variable in winter.

seo.title: Fladdabister Old Road — 5.7 km Easy Hike in the UK
seo.meta_description: Discover Fladdabister Old Road, an easy 5.7 km hike in the UK. Gentle terrain on a historic road with rural scenery, suitable for beginners and casual walkers.
